name: Viridescent Dragon: Chapter 3
description:
If you haven't yet, please check out Chapter 1, Chapter 2, and the Halloween Special.

This is the third chapter of my Visual Novel series, Viridescent Dragon.

(As this is a kinetic visual novel, it is straight-forward and you could just auto-play it like a movie if you'd like. I am considering adding choices in any future chapters/stand-alone novels.)

Charlotte and Dawn travel to Laseaux to retrieve Queen Tempest and search for Seleste. The Violean Army and many people from around the world will be there for the annual Mach Ball game and the Lady Margaux's coming of age ceremony. What trials will our sea-faring adventurers face yet? This chapter features 5+ CGs and several new characters.

This visual novel was made with Ren'Py. It's also finally available for PC, Mac and Linux.

Credits

Thank you very much, and I hope you enjoy the game!
